typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CuratedAddress1
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CuratedAddress2
CuratedAddress1 derive(source = "1") ~> CloudSalesAddress2
CloudSalesAddress2 derive(UniqueID = source + CustomerID + AddressID) ~> CloudSalesAddress3
CuratedAddress2 derive(source = "1") ~> CloudStreamingAddress2
CloudStreamingAddress2 derive(UniqueID = source + CustomerID + AddressID) ~> CloudStreamingAddress3
CloudSalesAddress3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CloudSalesAddressSink1
CloudStreamingAddress3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CloudStreamingAddressSink2

source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CloudSales
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CloudStreaming
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeRentals
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OnPremRentals
CloudSales derive(Source = "1") ~> DerivedColumnForCloudSales
CloudStreaming derive(source = "1") ~> DerivedColumnForClousStreaming
FourthCoffeeRentals derive(source = "3") ~> DerivedColumnForFourthCoffeeRentals
OnPremRentals derive(source = "2") ~> DerivedColumnForOnPremRentals
DerivedColumnForCloudSales derive(UniqueCustomerID = Source+CustomerID,
		CreatedDate_Tr = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate_Tr = toDate(UpdatedDate)) ~> UniqueCustomerID
DerivedColumnForFourthCoffeeRentals derive(UniqueCustomerID = source+CustomerID,
		CreatedDate_Tr = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate_Tr = toDate(UpdatedDate)) ~> UniqueCustomerID3
DerivedColumnForOnPremRentals derive(UniqueCustomerID = source+CustomerID,
		CreatedDate_Tr = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate_Tr = toDate(UpdatedDate)) ~> UniqueCustomerID4
DerivedColumnForClousStreaming derive(UniqueCustomerID = source+CustomerID,
		CreatedDate_Tr = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate_Tr = toDate(UpdatedDate)) ~> UniqueCustomerID2
UniqueCustomerID sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerCloudSalesSink
UniqueCustomerID2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerCloudStreamingParquetSink
UniqueCustomerID3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerFourthCoffeeRentalsSink
UniqueCustomerID4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerOnPremRentalsSink
